page.title: 09VINEYARD'S ROAD NORTHAW.
page.content: On Friday before half term we went in a small group to the caravan site down Vineyard's Road.When we got there we went in a house called High Willows. The caravan site was 25years old and covers 1\acres.It is owned by Mrs.Braun who has lived at the house for 10years.Over all the house,site and grounds cover 5acres.Travellers from as far away as New Zealand have stayed at the site.The maximum stay is 28days and the site can take, at the most 5 caravans. The site is PRIVATE and you have to book into it through The Caravan Club. High Willows was built in 1860 and converted in 1951 as it was in a bad condition.Vineyard's Rd. was so named because grapevines were grown here, way back in history. We have discovered that 500 vines grow here today on land owned by Nyn Manor Farm!
